ai-patthana8.72:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.72:1.1_0: not only for the sake of this teaching,
ai-patthana8.72:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of natural excellence.
ai-patthana8.72:3.1_0: Not for the sake of natural principles, nor for one reason, the teaching, and for one reason.
ai-patthana8.72:4.1_0: ... five objects the results of the universal objects ...
